text: allahanu pavitra bhavana ka'aba:Vannu manavara asraya dhamavagisiruvanu. Hageye, pavitra tingalugalu, baliprani mattu koralapattiyiruva (harakeya) pranigalu (avana sanketagalagive). Akasagalalli mattu bhumiyalliruva ellavannu allahanu ballanu mattu allahanu pratiyondu visayada jnana ullavanu embudu nimage tilidirabekendu (idannella nimage vivarisalaguttide)
